name: Blackwood Haven: Modern A-Frame Cabin House Plans (972 SF) – 2 Bed 2 Bath
open_features: Full drawing set: A.0 Cover, A.1 Floor Plans, A.2 Elevations, E.1 Power, E.2 Lighting, M.1 Mechanical, P.1 Water, P.2 Sanitary, S.1 Section & Detail
Floor system: 11-7/8" engineered I-joists @ 16" O.C. (per manufacturer) with 3/4" T&G subfloor
Roof: 11-7/8" I-joist rafters @ 16" O.C.; lifetime architectural shingles over felt; R-49 blown insulation
Exterior walls: 2×6 studs @ 16" O.C., 1/2" OSB, housewrap, LP SmartSide/vinyl siding; BIBS insulation system
Windows/doors schedule included; typical trim details interior/exterior
Electrical: 200A service, GFCI/WR where required, device/lighting layouts and legends
Mechanical: duct layout with CFM callouts; equipment/return/supply shown
Plumbing: PEX hot/cold runs; sanitary layout with 2"–4" waste/vent sizes
Section shows foundation/sill, anchor bolts, drainage tile, insulation, and typical wall/roof build-ups
safety_note: Plans are for planning/preliminary use only; local code compliance, permitting, engineering, and site verification required.
